The word أَدْرَاكَ comes from the root د ر ي and is associated with the meanings: To know, know by skill.

data.meanings: to knock, strike, beat, hit the butt, gnash (the teeth), strike with severity. qari'atun - great calamity that destroys a nation, adversity that comes suddenly, a name of the day of resurrection, great abuse.
data.sentence: The word الْقَارِعَةُ comes from the root ق ر ع and is associated with the meanings: to knock, strike, beat, hit the butt, gnash (the teeth), strike with severity. qari'atun - great calamity that destroys a nation, adversity that comes suddenly, a name of the day of resurrection, great abuse.
